title: Pizza bread rolls
ingredients: ['500g plain flour', '300ml water', '2 teaspoons dried active yeast', '1 (290g) jar kalamata olives, pitted', '225-350g mature Cheddar cheese, grated', 'grated Parmesan, to taste', 'ground paprika, to taste', '1 onion, finely chopped', '80g diced bacon', 'mixed herbs, to taste', 'tomato puree, as needed']
